# ![MixMashNet logo](reference/figures/MixMashNet_logo.png) MixMashNet 

Â 

**MixMashNet** is an R package that provides a unified framework for
estimating and analysing single layer and multilayer networks using
**Mixed Graphical Models (MGMs)**.

The package is designed for the analysis of complex biomedical and
epidemiological data, allowing the joint modelling of conditional
dependencies between variables of mixed types (continuous, binary, and
categorical), both within and across multiple layers.

------------------------------------------------------------------------

## Main features

MixMashNet provides tools for:

- estimation of MGM networks;
- specification and estimation of multilayer network structures;
- bootstrap-based stability for edges and node-level indices;
- computation of centrality and bridge metrics;
- assessment of membership stability and community scores;
- visualization of networks and associated metrics, including
  interactive exploration via **Shiny** applications.

------------------------------------------------------------------------

## Installation

The development version of **MixMashNet** can be installed from GitHub:

``` r

# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("ARCbiostat/MixMashNet")
```

# Package index

## All functions

- [`MixMashNet`](https://arcbiostat.github.io/MixMashNet/reference/MixMashNet-package.md)
  [`MixMashNet-package`](https://arcbiostat.github.io/MixMashNet/reference/MixMashNet-package.md)
  : Tools for Multilayer and Single Layer Network Modeling
- [`bacteremia`](https://arcbiostat.github.io/MixMashNet/reference/bacteremia.md)
  : Bacteremia dataset
- [`bridge_metrics()`](https://arcbiostat.github.io/MixMashNet/reference/bridge_metrics.md)
  : Bridge metrics for nodes across communities
- [`bridge_metrics_excluded()`](https://arcbiostat.github.io/MixMashNet/reference/bridge_metrics_excluded.md)
  : Bridge metrics for nodes excluded from communities
- [`community_scores()`](https://arcbiostat.github.io/MixMashNet/reference/community_scores.md)
  : Compute community scores from a fitted MixMashNet model
- [`find_bridge_communities()`](https://arcbiostat.github.io/MixMashNet/reference/find_bridge_communities.md)
  : Bridge profiles of a node across communities
- [`membershipStab()`](https://arcbiostat.github.io/MixMashNet/reference/membershipStab.md)
  : Node stability from bootstrap community assignments
- [`mixMN()`](https://arcbiostat.github.io/MixMashNet/reference/mixMN.md)
  : Estimate single layer MGM network with bootstrap centrality, bridge
  metrics, clustering, and (optionally) community score loadings
- [`multimixMN()`](https://arcbiostat.github.io/MixMashNet/reference/multimixMN.md)
  : Multilayer MGM with bootstrap, intra/interlayer metrics, and
  quantile regions
- [`nhanes`](https://arcbiostat.github.io/MixMashNet/reference/nhanes.md)
  : NHANES dataset
- [`nhgh_data`](https://arcbiostat.github.io/MixMashNet/reference/nhgh_data.md)
  : NHGH dataset
- [`plot(`*`<mixmashnet>`*`)`](https://arcbiostat.github.io/MixMashNet/reference/plot.mixmashnet.md)
  : Plot method for MixMashNet objects
- [`print(`*`<mixmashnet>`*`)`](https://arcbiostat.github.io/MixMashNet/reference/print.mixmashnet.md)
  : Print method for MixMashNet objects
- [`summary(`*`<mixmashnet>`*`)`](https://arcbiostat.github.io/MixMashNet/reference/summary.mixmashnet.md)
  : Summarize MixMashNet fits (single and multilayer) in long format
- [`update_palette()`](https://arcbiostat.github.io/MixMashNet/reference/update_palette.md)
  : Update community and layer color palettes in MixMashNet objects
